pipettes._instruction: The pipettes that have been used to patch this cell

startMembranePotential._instruction: Membrane potential of patched cell at the beginning of recording

endMembranePotential._instruction: Membrane potential of patched cell at the end of recording

chlorideReversalPotential._instruction: The chloride reversal potential calculated from the intracellular solution of the pipette

labelingCompound._instruction: The compound used in the pipette to label the cell
